alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 11:57AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact coastal section of San Luis Obispo county between Morro Bay and Cayucos through 100 PM PDT... At 1155 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Morro Bay, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morro Bay...Cambria...Cayucos...and Baywood-Los Osos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys
